      • register

        public static void register()
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Called at initialization in the static context. Registers cuda functions based on the cudafunctions.properties in the classpath
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.Exception

      • invoke

        public static void invoke(int blocks,
          int threadsPerBlock,
          java.lang.String functionName,
          java.lang.String dataType,
          java.lang.Object... kernelParameters)
        Invoke a function with the given number of parameters
        Parameters:
        blocks - the number of blocks to launch the kernel
        threadsPerBlock - the number of threads per block
        kernelParameters - the parameters
        dataType - the data type to use
